nodes.text: A peggat was a form of currency used by the Hutts on Tatooine. A peggat was the equivalent of four truguts or 64 golden wupiupi, while it normally exchanged for roughly 40 credits.

Peggats, alongside aurei and zemids, were among several of the blood money that was looted from thousands of worlds by the First Order's campaigns. Because these coins could be melted down, they had a universal value.
